name: SCNView.Option
desc: Dictionary keys specifying initialization options, used when initializing a SceneKit view.

items.name: static let preferLowPowerDevice: SCNView.Option
items.desc: An option for whether to select low-power-usage devices for Metal rendering.

items.name: static let preferredDevice: SCNView.Option
items.desc: The device to use for Metal rendering.

items.name: static let preferredRenderingAPI: SCNView.Option
items.desc: The rendering API to use for rendering the view (for example, Metal or OpenGL).
